name: UIActivityItemProvider
desc: A proxy for data that passes to an activity view controller.

items.name: init(placeholderItem: Any)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a provider object with the specified placeholder data.

items.name: var item: Any
items.desc: Generates and returns the actual data-bearing object.

items.name: var placeholderItem: Any?
items.desc: The placeholder object you specified at initialization time.

items.name: var activityType: UIActivity.ActivityType?
items.desc: The type of the activity object that is expecting the data.
